vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.27;
son of: Haran (H2039);
brother of: Milcah (H4435) and Iscah (H3252);
father of: daughter1_of_Lot (H3876H), daughter2_of_Lot (H3876I), Moab (H4124H), Ben-ammi (H1151)
Also named: Lōt<\i> (Λώτ "Lot" G3091)
§ Lot = "covering"
son of Haran and Abraham's nephew who settled in Sodom and was delivered from its destruction by God
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   cubierta; (2)   hijo de Harán; sobrino de Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅得 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "遮蓋住"
哈蘭之子, 亞伯拉罕的姪子, 他選擇居住在所多瑪, 在神毀滅所多瑪
時被神的使者救出
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗得 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "遮盖住"
哈兰之子, 亚伯拉罕的侄子, 他选择居住在所多玛, 在神毁灭所多玛
时被神的使者救出
